description: Paul Tipping, who admitted breaking the Isle of Man's emergency laws, received a four-week sentence.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man shopper jailed for failing to self-isolate
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man shopper jailed for failing to self-isolate - BBC News
maintext: On the Isle of Man anyone living in a household where someone else has reported symptoms of the disease must self-isolate for a mandatory 14-day period and can only leave the property to exercise if they have not shown symptoms themselves.
